title: Download The 'Marvel's Spider-Man: Turf Wars' DLC Chapter Now
text: The second chapter of 'Marvel's Spider-Man: The City That Never Sleeps' DLC series is now available!

title: A New Beginning for Carnage
text: Prepare for Web of Venom: Carnage Born #1 with a look back at the first appearance of Cletus Kasady!

title: Fantastic Four: Replacement Roundup
text: When one of the core four can't make it, they invite someone new to join the team!

title: top 10 MCU fights
text: In this very special Marvel Top 10, we're counting down the most memorable movie melees. Watch the video above to see the following throwdowns in action!
